a view of a wide area: From the hotel roof you can enjoy a panorama of the whole city. A tunnel of tropical vegetation opens up into a panorama of mountains.
Edward Duckitt/Gallo Images/GettyImages
a photograph in which the image is shown in a wide view: A panorama of the planet Mars was named top science photo. The software will stitch together 800 separate pictures into one huge 360-degree panorama.
a view, description, or study of events or activities: The investigation revealed a panorama of corruption and illegal dealings. "Saving Savannah" offers a dramatic panorama of everyday life in Savannah.
